input.sentences: who says castles only exist in fairy tales ?
i took my daughters to an actual castle this summer . every princess deserves to see one in their life time .
some people do n't respect history .
not all areas were accessible but they still made for nice photos .
vandals got a hold of this area and burnt it .
output.sentences: Once upon a time, there was an enchanted castle.
In the summer time, a young prince would stay in the castle.
The princess tried to lock herself away in it.
But vandals came and destroyed the place.
